rules_text: When Roa dies, exile it from your graveyard then exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a creature that has a mana value equal to this creature plus 1. Cast it without paying its mana cost and its name becomes Roa, The Infinite Reincarnator, it’s a vampire in addition to its other types and it gains this ability. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order
